task_summary: Approach the drawer handle, grasp it, and pull to open the drawer, then retreat to clear the opening.

task_long_description.overview: A mobile manipulator with a parallel gripper operates in a kitchen scene with a wooden cabinet and a drawer under a countertop. The robot must visually acquire the drawer handle, align its gripper, grasp the handle, and execute the opening action. Visual scanning is allowed if the handle is not immediately visible. Motions should be precise near the handle, using moderate gripping force. After the drawer opens, the robot retreats slightly to avoid collision with the drawer front.
preconditions: Workspace is clear in front of the drawer
Robot base pose provides reach to the handle
Perception pipeline can detect the drawer handle
stepwise_plan: Check if handle is visible; if not, scan to localize it.
Move above the handle and precisely align.
Close gripper to grasp the handle.
Command container opening for the drawer (pull action).
Retreat to clear the drawer front.
success_criteria: Drawer front translates outward from cabinet body
No loss of grasp during pull
End-effector clears the newly opened drawer
failure_and_recovery: Handle not detected -> scan with retries
Slip during pull -> reopen, regrasp, and try again
task_long_description.termination: Terminate when drawer is confirmed opened and the robot has retreated to a safe distance.

frame_4.now_evidence: Clear grasp on the handle; end-effector aligned.
frame_4.predicts_next: Pull/open action expected immediately after grasp.

frame_5.now_evidence: Drawer appears in motion; gripper actively pulling.
frame_5.predicts_next: Completion of open followed by retreat.

node_specs.description: Prepare gripper for approach by opening to medium width.
Quick check: handle visible in current view.
Active scan to localize handle if not immediately visible.
Move to a pregrasp pose above the handle.
Precise approach and alignment with the handle axis.
Close gripper to grasp the handle with moderate force.
Back off to clear the open drawer.

failure_modes: Handle not detected due to glare or occlusion
Collision with countertop or drawer front
